data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 211,463, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Central and Western, Hong Kong
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Central and Western that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Central and Western.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Central and Western, Hong Kong to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Central and Western, Hong Kong that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 228,409 lost in Central and Western that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Central and Western. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.section_summary:
the state of Central and Western, Hong Kong has a population of 243,300.

We estimate Central and Western has 14,891 people who might know Jesus, 16,946 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 211,463 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 16 neighbors who need Jesus.
